ygData.subject: Re: Runed totem and skull
ygData.msgSnippet: which leads me to believe that the skull still is used in some fashion to unleash its magical properties to the user.  But what? ... From: Neil Lambert
ygData.messageBody:
which leads me to believe that the skull still is used in some fashion to
unleash its magical properties to the user. But what?



-----Original Message-----
From: Neil Lambert [mailto:smartass@...]
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 2:33 AM
To: EQ_Wizards
Subject: [eq_wizards] Runed totem and skull


i just spent an entire day at Verant Int. it was a helluva lotta fun. I met
the guy who developed all the spells, went to lunch with smed, etc. I even
had a chance to ask him about the runed totem and that skull. RUMOR. you can
do no such thing. his GM character has one and it's called the staff of
discord and you probably get it if you kill the priest of discord. other
than that, the runed totem staff is ONLY the runed totem staff and cannot
into something else....
